Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: init(onSegmentedChange:_:)
Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Initializes the segmented control with the given items. Items may be NSStrings, UIImages, or (as of iOS 14.0) UIActions. When constructing from a UIAction segments will prefer images over titles when both are provided. The segmented control is automatically sized to fit content.

Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: insertSegment(action:at:animated:)
Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Insert a segment with the given action at the given index. Segments will prefer images over titles when both are provided. When the segment is selected UIAction.actionHandler is called. If a segment already exists with the action’s identifier that segment will either be updated (if the index is the same) or it will be removed (if different).

Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: setAction(_:forSegmentAt:)
Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Reconfigures the given segment with this action. Segments will prefer images over titles when both are provided. When the segment is selected UIAction.actionHandler is called. UIAction.identifier must either match the action of the existing segment at this index, or be unique within all actions associated with the segmented control, or this method will assert.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: preferredDatePickerStyle(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Request a style for the date picker. If the style changed, then the date picker may need to be resized and will generate a layout pass to display correctly.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: datePickerStyle()
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: The style that the date picker is using for its layout. This property always returns a concrete style (never automatic).

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: hidesForSinglePage(_:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: hides the indicator if there is only one page, default is NO

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: pageIndicatorTintColor(_:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: The tint color for non-selected indicators. Default is nil.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: currentPageIndicatorTintColor(_:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: The tint color for the currently-selected indicators. Default is nil.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: backgroundStyle(_:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: The preferred background style. Default is UIPageControlBackgroundStyleAutomatic on iOS, and UIPageControlBackgroundStyleProminent on tvOS.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: interactionState()
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: The current interaction state for when the current page changes. Default is UIPageControlInteractionStateNone

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: allowsContinuousInteraction(_:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: Returns YES if the continuous interaction is enabled, NO otherwise. Default is YES.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: preferredIndicatorImage(_:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: The preferred image for indicators. Symbol images are recommended. Default is nil.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: indicatorImage(forPage:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: @abstract Returns the override indicator image for the specific page, nil if no override image was set.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: setIndicatorImage(_:forPage:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: @abstract Override the indicator image for a specific page. Symbol images are recommended.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: size(forNumberOfPages:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: Returns the minimum size required to display indicators for the given page count. Can be used to size the control if the page count could change.

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: defersCurrentPageDisplay(_:)
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: if set, tapping to a new page won’t update the currently displayed page until -updateCurrentPageDisplay is called. default is NO

Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.name: updateCurrentPageDisplay()
Structs/PageControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit11Pa.abstract: update page display to match the currentPage. ignored if defersCurrentPageDisplay is NO. setting the page value directly will update immediately

Structs/ForEach.html#/s:7ArgoKit7ForEach.name: focusGroupIdentifier(_:)
Structs/ForEach.html#/s:7ArgoKit7ForEach.abstract: The identifier of the focus group that this view belongs to. If this is nil, subviews inherit their superview’s focus group.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
